instruction: Identify two different ways of using a Drone
output: Drones can be used for a variety of applications. One of the most common uses is for aerial photography and videography. Drones with advanced cameras allow photographers and filmmakers to capture stunning, high quality images from levels that would otherwise be difficult to reach. Another popular application is delivery and logistics. Companies such as Amazon and UPS have begun using drones to deliver packages to customers in an efficient and timely manner. Finally, drones can also be used for agricultural purposes, such as monitoring crops and providing targeted watering and fertilization.
